store.mission: To empower every body to live, work, and play—confidently and sustainably—through apparel that unites Pacific‑Northwest inspiration with timeless, everyday style.

founders.name: Stella Reed
founders.background: Minnesota prairie dreamer; values comfort, function, and planet‑minded design.

founders.name: Maya Carter
founders.background: Boston harbor adventurer; blends urban polish with outdoor readiness.

store.founding_story: Stella and Maya met at Seattle’s Ballard Farmers Market under a rain‑spattered awning. They sketched a brand where style, sustainability, and body positivity walk hand‑in‑hand—outfitting eco‑conscious customers from coffee runs to gallery strolls.

personality_tone.flavor: Pacific‑Northwest freshness—espresso energy and drizzle‑proof optimism.
personality_tone.imagery: City skylines framed by firs; neighborhood parks, bike lanes, and cozy cafés.

store.iconography: Stylized fir leaf forming a subtle power‑symbol arrow
differentiators: Size‑Inclusive Fit System across men’s, women’s & unisex
Repair & Renew lifetime repairs and recycling
store.brand_story_one_sentence: Born in Seattle’s rain‑kissed streets, Fierce Evergreen Apparel designs planet‑friendly fashion that lets every body live fiercely—every day.
